name: Ext_R4B_SubscriptionTopic_ca_modifier
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SubscriptionTopic|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: = | eq | ne | gt | lt | ge | le | sa | eb | ap | above | below | in | not-in | of-type
element.definition: Allowable operators to apply when determining matches (Search Modifiers).  If the filterParameter is a SearchParameter, this list of modifiers SHALL be a strict subset of the modifiers defined on that SearchParameter.
element.comment: `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier` maps to R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: = | eq | ne | gt | lt | ge | le | sa | eb | ap | above | below | in | not-in | of-type
element.definition: Allowable operators to apply when determining matches (Search Modifiers).  If the filterParameter is a SearchParameter, this list of modifiers SHALL be a strict subset of the modifiers defined on that SearchParameter.
element.comment: `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier` maps to R5 `SubscriptionTopic.canFilterBy.modifier`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Operator to apply to filter label.
